Test Name: Human Transforming Growth Factor Beta 1 (TGF-B1) ELISA
Purpose: Quantitative measurement of TGF-B1 levels in human specimens for clinical assessment.
Container: Serum or plasma blood collection tube (e.g., serum separator or EDTA/heparin tube)
Equipment: ELISA microplate reader, calibrated microplate washer, incubator, micropipettes
